channel.title: Relentless - Bounty Hunter [508/525]
channel.description:
[url=http://z6.invisionfree.com/Relentless525][size=36pt]Forums[/size][/url]
[url=http://www.mediafire.com/?dazkb14zae4gkev][size=36pt]Client Download[/size][/url]
Relentless features one of the best Bounty Hunter systems available which includes features such as:
- Assigns only targets who are actually in Bounty Hunter (common glitch on most servers) - Max Players with same target cap (Fix for "piling") - Low and Med craters added (standard BH systems only have High) - Bounty Score System with fully working Scoreboards(both Hunter and Rogue) - Fixed glitchy skull append system - Viewing Orbs fully working (even with Low and Med craters) - Fixed "BH Skulled" Glitch (Standard BH systems don't remove skull status when leaving) - Mandrith features a "Tutorial Dialogue" for people unfamiliar with Bounty Hunter - Bonus PK Point Weekends (Every weekend it's automatically enabled) - Perfect Switching
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/akdhsg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2lt3gux.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/x3ss42.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/idcheq.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/1zweszn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/10d9ohg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2ymdk5s.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/m9x72e.png[/img]

item.title: Relentless - Bounty Hunter [508/525]
item.dc:creator: @relentlessserver relentlessserver
item.description:
@relentlessserver wrote:

[size=36pt]Forums[/size]

[size=36pt]Client Download[/size]

Relentless features one of the best Bounty Hunter systems available which includes features such as:

  • Assigns only targets who are actually in Bounty Hunter (common glitch on most servers)
  • Max Players with same target cap (Fix for “piling”)
  • Low and Med craters added (standard BH systems only have High)
  • Bounty Score System with fully working Scoreboards(both Hunter and Rogue)
  • Fixed glitchy skull append system
  • Viewing Orbs fully working (even with Low and Med craters)
  • Fixed “BH Skulled” Glitch (Standard BH systems don’t remove skull status when leaving)
  • Mandrith features a “Tutorial Dialogue” for people unfamiliar with Bounty Hunter
  • Bonus PK Point Weekends (Every weekend it’s automatically enabled)
  • Perfect Switching
